# SSAPI â€” Simple Server API

SSAPI is a small, fully free server/client skeleton for Python.  
It does not enforce any data format or storage; users can implement anything they want.  

## Features
- Threaded TCP server with hooks: on_connect, on_receive, on_disconnect, on_error
- Thread-safe ClientConnection helper
- Lightweight FreeClient for testing
- Fully extensible and free
